title.text: From digital library to n-grams: NB N-gram

abstractContent.text: At the National Library of Norway, we are currently developing a service comparable to the Google Ngram Viewer (Michel et al., 2010; Lin et al., 2012; Aiden and Michel, 2013) called NB N-gram.
It is based on all books and newspapers digitized up to and including 2013, as part of the large scale digitiza-tion project at the National Library of Norway.
Uni-, bi-and trigams have been generated on the basis of this text corpus containing some 34 billion words.
In this paper, we sketch the background of NB N-gram and illustrate some applications of it.
